subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: When Queen Victoria watched what became the first America’s Cup race in 1851, her minions scanned the horizon with telescopes to watch the demise of the British fleet at the hands of the schooner America.
snippet: When Queen Victoria watched what became the first America’s Cup race in 1851, her minions scanned the horizon with telescopes to watch the demise of the British fleet at the hands of the schooner America.
